data.eml:eml: First records of Dentridactylinae (Orthoptera: Tridactylidae) from Colombia, with description of two new species of Dentridactylus Günther

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baena-Bejarano, Nathalie, Heads, Sam W. (2018): First records of Dentridactylinae (Orthoptera: Tridactylidae) from Colombia, with description of two new species of Dentridactylus Günther. Zootaxa 4402 (3): 575-584, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4402.3.10
